properties.description: pipeline to convert different files to Sql

activities.name: Copy data to auto created table

properties.description:
copy and convert a set of tables to csv files using adf
source sqldb
sink adls

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT *
FROM mydbtestadf001.information_schema.tables
WHERE Table_Schema = 'SalesLT' AND Table_Type = 'base table'

properties.description: creating additional fileds (columns) at the destination also using dynamic contents (expressions)

activities.name: copy sweet treats to a table
activities.description: lesson learnt when creating new columns, using the pre-copy script at the sink the fields are created but the data did not copy, I had to go back to remove the pre-copy script and debug the pipeline.

sink.preCopyScript:
alter table [dbo].[newtable]
add AuditId uniqueidentifier null, FilePath nvarchar (500)

dependsOn.activity: Get Metadata of Get Metadata Activity
